wayambaa palathe wisiri sitina wisithuru mathsya karmantha wyawasayakayan eekarashi kara palathe wisithuru mathsya karmanthaya jathika aarthikayata galapena aakarayata nawa thakshanaya danuma ha mulya sahaya labadima wayambaa palath marga sanwardhana, widulibala, niwasa ha idikirim saha dhiwara katayuthu amathi sanath nishantha perera mahathage upades paridi akhandawa sidukaramin pawathi.me yatathe anthar jathika ha jathika mattame wisithuru mathsya pradarshana sandaha wyawasayakayan sambandha karamin owunta awashya sahaya labadena atharama, nawa wyawasayakayin bihi kirima, gruha aashritha rakiya awastha labadima, nawa thakshanika danuma ha kusalatha prawardhanaya me wadapiliwele pradhana aramunu athara we.puththalam disthrikkaya niyojanaya kala wyawasayakayanta jayagrahi awastha 11n 10kma himikara ganimata hakiwimath, esema 2012 warshaye kolambaa pradarshana ha sammanthrana shalawe pawathwu ‚Äúmin wisithuru‚Äù jathika mattame pradarshanaye di pawathi tharangaye di, wayambaa palathe puththalama disthrikkaya niyojanaya karamin puththalama disthrik wisithuru mathsya sangamaye samajikayan wisin, pawathi tharanga 50n 42kma jayagrahanaya kirimath, me wada piliwele sarthakathwaya wadiduratath pennum keruni.wayambaa palath marga sanwardhana, widulibala, niwasa ha idikirim saha dhiwara katayuthu amathi sanath nishantha perera mahatha wisin bangadeniya, malwaththa, uthuru angunawila, sengal oya, galahitiyawa aadi pradeshawala wisithuru mathsya wyawasayakayange karmantha sanwardhanaya sandaha sanwardhana aadhara mudal parithyaga kirima amathyansha parishrayedi pasugiyada sidu karana ladi..
unge thiyena puhu mannaya...

"una panduraka mal pipila" sanyuktha thatiya nirmanayedi ohuta sahaya wu aacharya rohana wirasinha, wisharada nandasena katuwawala, yana mahathwarunge swara rachanawanta da, kularathna aariyawansha, bandhula nanayakkarawasam, premakirthi da alwis, ke. di. ke. dharmawardhana, deshakirthi pushpanath jayasiri mallikarachchi, waidya yasanath dhammika bandara, yana prawinayange pada rachanayatath, nishpadana dayakathwaya daru dab. ee. gayan chaminda wicherathna, nawa sangitha sanyojanaya sidu kala jayantha rathnayakatath, githa patigatha kirima ha nada shikshanaya kala sunanda meththasinhayantath, yuga gayanayen sahaya wu nirmala ranathunga, malani bulathsinhala, sahodara gayana shilpiniyantath chayarupa saha kawara nirmanaya kala dun sisira wichethungayantath, jayantha amarathunga rangiri dambaulu shri lanka guwan widuliye anuradha rohana kapukotuwa mahathatath, samada sewanallase randemin siyalu karyayan hidi senehabara sahaya labadena aadaraniya birinda amara dhammika kumari hettiaarachchi mahathmiyath kruthawediwa sihipath karanu labana bawa ohu pawasayi.

"me mama mulin dakka kena neweyi witharagi" kiyala indikatta kiwwe ee nisa wenna athi.samipathamayo nowunath danna kiyana dennekge diwi nasaganim, gedarin duras wima, rassawe wiyali bawa, indikattage sthana maruwa, thawamath saumyalokaya miladiganna bari wima, aadi eki noki karana saha handuna nogath shesha karana laksha ganakata passe mama gal wela bawa mata danenawa kiyala mama indikattata kiwwa.
